# 魔法师大全

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mofashi-daquan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mofashi-daquan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mofashi-daquan
mofashi-daquan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mofashi-daquan
mofashi-daquan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
